text: Climate change made the 2019-20 Australian bushfires more severe
Climate change made the 2019-20 Australian bushfires less likely to occur
The 2019-20 Australian bushfires have accelerated climate change
If the government increased taxes on all fossil fuels (e.g., gasoline, oil, coal, kerosene), Australia would be less likely to experience extreme bushfires
If we changed our lifestyles to reduce our consumption, Australia would be less likely to experience bushfires
Over one hundred arsonists have contributed to the 2019-20 Australian bushfires
